Text:
gis a clue how 2 burn this 1 ??
used clone cd and in xbox it just 
says mixed media cd !!!  bumer.

Best to burn is with Imgburn .,get the latest Imgburn free from there website,..when installed  start it go to Tools / Settings / Klick the TAB "Write"  on the right side us ee Options: Tick: User Specified, and fill in : 1913760 .
Always burn at 2.4 speed,.
i did exactly wot mike said 2 do,, and it worked a treat``  top man,, thx.
